alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elbert, southeastern Arapahoe, southern Washington and northeastern Lincoln Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Elba to 12 miles southeast of Cottonwood Valley, or along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Akron to 17 miles north of Limon. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thurman, Arickaree School, Anton, Elba, Platner, Woodlin School, Lindon and Last Chance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County
